llm_res.rule: allowance function should return the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
decimals: Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation.
approve function should allow _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
